programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Onion Odyssey
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite street food dishes from around the world that feature onions. including Seeni Sambol Buns from Sri Lanka. a Blooming Onion from the USA. and Scallion Pancakes from South Korea.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Thai Take-Out
programme.desc: Toss out the take-out menu! In just 30 minutes, host Spencer Watts shows us how to cook a mouth-watering Thai take-out dinner for four.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Japanese Take-Out
programme.desc: Instead of going out for dinner, Spencer Watts cooks up a Japanese Take-out feast for four in around 30 minutes, for around 30 dollars.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 DIY Weddings
programme.desc: Warm host Jessica McGovern offers up some do-it-yourself recipes that will spice up any wedding.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Around the World
programme.desc: Talented baker Jessica McGovern takes us around the world with diverse desserts from countries like Japan and Germany.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Picnic
programme.desc: Picnics are fun, elegant, and filled with delicious food! Host Jessica McGovern shows us some of her favourite picnic-ready desserts.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Saturday Morning Breakfast
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern shows us how to make delightful breakfast treats like banana bread and hand pies filled with grape jelly.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Surprise Ingredients
programme.desc: Surprise! Host Jessica McGovern uses unusual surprise ingredients in three delicious desserts.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Summer

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Love is in the air for this Valentine's Day edition of Gusto's Holiday Eatz"... your party menu resource starring supERS-fun kitchen dynamo, Chef Kimberly Lallouz! First base? How about tempura oysters with a kiss of strawberry? Up next, it's straight from the 'heart' with an artichoke tart featuring melty cheese, homemade crust, and fresh herbs. Lamb Chops with Beurre Rouge are the main event, served rare and dusted with freshly ground pink peppercorns. Kimberly wraps things up with a fun new take on Chocolate and Roses - pressing white chocolate ice cream between rosewater spiked sugar cookies. It's a heart-stopping finale worthy of your favourite rom-com!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Creamy
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on creamy sauces! First a duo of creamy butter sauces with salmon! Next up a sauce créme with beef tenderloin and a vegan coconut créme anglaise!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Savoury
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on savoury sauces! First up, a soy-miso-honey sauce for seared duck breast! Next, a black demi-glace for hanger steak and a sauce duxelles for scallops!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Spice
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wine
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 White Fish Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Skilled Chef Katie Ardington is excited to introduce her favourite fish, striped sea bass, in this fabulous voyage through the 7 seas of seafood cookery.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Chicken Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Chef-host Natalia Machado loves chicken, and who doesn't? Chicken is enjoyed around the world for good reason; it is versatile and reliably delicious!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 Salad Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Salad is a wonderful addition to any meal, and sometimes even a meal on its own"... today, the talented Chef Craig Wong shares several of his superior salad ideas.

programme.title: Cook Like A Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Pork Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Snout to tail cooking is Chef Derek Dammann's specialty, in this episode celebrating pork, he cooks everything but the squeal!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Liguria
programme.desc: Famed Chef Michael Bonacini celebrates the food of the Italian Riviera as he shows viewers delicious dishes from Liguria.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Emilia Romagna
programme.desc: Emilia Romagna is the culinary heart of Italy and Chef Michael Bonacini shows viewers how to make some of the region's most delicious dishes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Trentino-Alto Adige
programme.desc: Renowned Chef Michael Bonacini takes viewers on a culinary tour of the Italian region of Trentino-Alto Adige without leaving his own kitchen.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Basilicata
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Sour
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sour sauces! First a brown butter picatta sauce for chicken picatta! Next, a smoked tomato ponzu sauce for fried oysters and a duo of orange marmalade and lemon curd for crepes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Vegetable
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on veggie sauces! First up, a Provencal sauce tomate to go with halibut! Next, a rustic pepperonata with flank steak and a trio of pestos!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Salty & Funky
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on salty, funky sauces! First up, a gorgonzola-prosciutto-orange wine pasta sauce! Next, a grape and olive tapenade to go with quail and sauce brandade for potatoes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Sweet
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sweet sauces! First up, a grown-up sundae with classic chocolate sauce! Next, a caramelized onion soubise for pork chops and a traditional sweet and sour chicken sauce!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 Mushrooms Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Mushrooms grow by the light of the moon; in this episode, our accomplished chef-host Katie Ardington expertly exposes them to the light of day"...

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 Salmon Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Salmon is one of the few fish worthy of its own Cook Like a Chef episode; join Chef Natalia Machado as she introduces us to its many virtues…

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 Lamb Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Chef Craig Wong loves cooking lamb, and with his expert advice, you will too!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 Game Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Game meats are on the menu for Chef Derek Dammann in this protein-packed episode of Cook Like a Chef.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Molise
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Valle D'Aosta
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michael's antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle D'Aosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle D'Aosta's unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Tuscany
programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. To bring his meal together, Michael ends...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Veneto
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 France + Vietnam
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates is television's best travel show that never leaves the kitchen. Skilled Chef Craig Wong is your host, and prepare to be blown away by his takes on the foods of France and Vietnam. First up? A re-write of a popular Vietnamese street snack made with Clams and Sesame Rice Noodles. Next? Marrow Toast dresses up in its tux and tails for a version made with King Oyster Mushrooms and Sauce Bordelaise. The common ingredient is Baguette; check out supersonic versions of French Jambon Beurre and Vietnamese Banh Mi. The Big Dish blends delicate sole with ProvencÌ§ale flavour spiked Nuoc Cham and a crunchy Haricot Amandine inspired Vietnamese crepe.

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 USA + India
programme.desc: Go-to Indian menu item Lamb Rogan Josh is one thing, but Lamb Sweetbreads Rogan Josh with Aloo Gobi Foam? That's a CombiNATION Plates thing! Craig Wong is at it again in this USA + India episode. After India, Chef moves on to the USA to answer the question, 'is everything better battered and fried?' with his Country Fried Torchon of Foie Gras. The common ingredient for these two distant nations is lobster, and really, who doesn't love it? For the US, it's Lobster with Cajun Spice Grits and Pickled Okra, and for India, check out Lobster Curry with Coconut Milk. The finale features Catfish like you've never seen it. Cooked Tandoori style and served with Collard Greens Paneer and Peach...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Iceland + Jamaica
programme.desc: Halibut is on the menu for Craig Wong's first stop in this episode of CombiNATION Plates for his Icelandic tribute, the firm, flaky fish is served with Lovage, BeÌarnaise, and Beet Glazed Turnips. Next, it's a Jamaican adventure on a plate featuring whole, soft-shell crab Escovitch, fried, doused in chili vinegar, and served with carrot meringue?! Check out the common ingredient: ice cream! With creamy Skyr style with Blueberries representing Iceland and an Avocado Lime sensation for Jamaica that only Chef Wong could pull off, made in mere moments with liquid nitrogen! The Big Dish is a you-could-only-find-it-here experience; Jamaican Jerk Spice Reindeer (yes, you read that right) served...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Ireland + Japan
programme.desc: If you are talking about Irish food, it's hard not to talk about Corned Beef and Cabbage. On this episode of CombiNATION Plates, Chef Craig Wong delivers his unusual take using Beef Cheek, modern technique, and a caraway-infused Carrot Terrine for fun! Next up is a tribute to Izakaya eats, featuring Tare Grilled Duck Hearts, Miso-roasted Mushroom, and Agedashi Tofu. The featured common ingredient is Oysters. For Ireland, it's Garlic GratineÌe; for Japan, check out the Kaki Yaki, oysters broiled with miso and rich Japanese Kewpie mayo. For the final dish, light up! Smoking is permitted! Check out blowtorch-seared and tableside-smoked Wagyu Beef, brushed with Irish Stout Teriyaki and...

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Magic in the Middle
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern gives us a little surprise on the inside by baking up tasty filled goodies.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Pretty Shower Goodies
programme.desc: Make hosting your next shower a cinch with Jessica McGovern's simple and super cute recipes - like tiny Oatmeal Cookie Cheesecake Cups!

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Flowers!
programme.desc: Flowers aren't just for smelling - they're great for baking too! Host Jessica McGovern shows us how to bake some tasty desserts with a floral twist.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 All About Eggs
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern shows us the versatility of eggs by baking up some tasty, egg-centric desserts like CrÃ¨me Brulee and Lemon Meringue Pie.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Rice and Rosemary
programme.desc: In this "R" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas shows us how to use rice and rosemary in delicious meals.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Lamb and Licorice
programme.desc: After picking the letter "L," Chef Robert Jewell takes on lamb and licorice in this ingredient challenge. He starts with aromatic Moroccan lamb riblets, an appetizer that will make you want this spicy dish as your main course too. Next, Robert takes it up a notch by showing us how to make licorice - yes, the candy! He brings coconut oil, brown sugar, creamed coconut, and molasses to boil before skillfully adding flour and anise to make sweet, chewy coconut licorice. Finally, Robert concocts the perfect recipe that combines succulent lamb with sweet licorice.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Radicchio and Raisins
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin creates savoury meals in this letter "R" challenge featuring radicchios and raisins. First, Theresa chops up bold and bitter radicchios, grilling them until the edges are a crispy golden brown and perfect for a warm wedge salad. Then, she tosses fried pancetta and earthy portobello mushrooms in a luxurious champagne vinegar and pours it over the crispy radicchio. Theresa tops this warm salad with creamy crumbled goat's cheese. For her next dish, Theresa prepares a rum raisin sauce using golden sultana raisins, dark rum, and fresh orange. Theresa pours the sauce over succulent ham. Is your mouth watering yet? Finally, Theresa combines radicchio and raisin into a...

programme.title: Everyday Excellent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Weekday Rush
programme.desc: With only 30 minutes and the clock ticking, can Vanessa make a quick weekday meal for 4 for about 40 bucks? On the menu: zucchini with balsamic and goat cheese, a rotini bake, and microwave lemon mug cakes!

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Long and the Short of It
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing meal featuring long and short ingredients! Josh makes a long sandwich, long grain rice, and a Long Island iced tea in a short glass, while Erica prepares long pepper short ribs, short grain rice, long beans, and long noodles!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccon Chronicles Eternal Love in Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Quest Rewa, India
programme.desc: Be it recipes that evolved from hunting or dishes that were prepared as offerings to god, Alex uncovers the secrets of royal Bagheli cuisine.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic

programme.title: Off The Grid

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico

programme.title: Quest

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Xp Guide Colombo, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: A place where sounds of the calming shores collides endlessly with that of an urbane environment and lives shuttle between the beaches.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Backpack, Egypt Cairo
programme.desc: Sabrina starts her backpacking journey in Egypt from the capital Cairo, evenly painted in the shades of ancient islamic and modern architecture.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Cambodia Sihanoukville 1
programme.desc: From Siem Reap to Sihanoukville, the next adventurous stop where food means spiders, crickets and cockroaches.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccon Chronicles One Flew Over Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Quest, Nagaland
programme.desc: While learning to prepare a Naga pork delicacy, Alex gets an understanding of the different dishes and cooking styles of Nagaland’s tribes.

programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Backpack Alexandria, Egypt
programme.desc: Sabrina explores Alexandria, a perfect amalgamation of modern culture and traditional arts. She visits the Royal library, Citadel and the grant Luxor temple and later tries traditional Arabic delicacies.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeen (ENG)
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Discovering Mechatronik, a company dedicated to the restoration and refinement of classic Mercedes-Benz. Also, a look at the Nissan 370 Z, Porsche Cayman, Chevrolet Camaro and Mercedes-AMG ML 63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Tuning
programme.desc: The GT MF 5 is a power pack.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Tuning
programme.desc: The who's who of automotive tuning congregate at the 82nd International Motor Show in Geneva, where around 180 European and global premiers will be shown.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Tuning
programme.desc: The tuning forge MTM is known for their extremely dynamic, optimally tuned vehicles. Also, a look at the Nissan Juke-R, a projectile with 485 horsepower and the dimensions of a cigar box.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb of 1987: A different type of race in the mountains of Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since 1934, the Grand Prix has been the most exciting and fascinating world championship in the world. With its state-of-the-art vehicles, with horsepower from the biggest brands, it never fails to wow its viewers.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which ran from 1970 - 1972.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built, the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight makes its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.sub-title: S01 : E34 Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintélyon
programme.desc: The Asics SaintéLyon is a legendary nocturnal ultramarathon in France that takes place on the route from Saint-Étienne to Lyon. The 2025 edition is scheduled for November 29 and 30 and promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: IWSA Formula Wing World Championships - Live delay
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E11 Stage 11 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E12 Stage 12 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E13 Stage 13 - SCL Cyprus 2023
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 1, Martinique
programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power
programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 3, Serbia
programme.desc: The third episode is hosted in Serbia where world records are broken!

programme.desc: 2025 Vadim Nemkov FAST Fight Compilation

programme.title: Fighter Compilation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E98 2025 Yoel Romero Fight Compilation
programme.desc: Yoel Romero is that guy - let's watch a few of his scraps that prove it.

programme.title: 2025 Best Finishes by Division - PFL FAST Compilation
programme.desc: Check out these finishes, but don't forget the popcorn!

programme.desc: Johnny Eblen Battle of the Giants Compilation

programme.title: PFL in 60 - 2025 PFL Africa 3
programme.desc: PFL in 60 - The third PFL Africa event of 2025

programme.title: 2025 10 Knockouts that Put PFL Fighters on the Map

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 GLORY 4 Tokyo
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S11 : E07 GLORY 82 Bonn
programme.desc: The event will be headlined by an exhilarating heavyweight matchup between No. 1 ranked contender Antonio Plazibat and No. 10 ranked contender Raul Catinas. Co-headlining the event is a Welterweight Title Bout between Alim Nabiyev and Endy Semeleer. Also featured on the card, MMA veteran Joilton Lutterbach will make his GLORY debut against fellow debutant Mark Trijsburg in a welterweight bout. Top-five lightweight contender Itay Gershon will make his return to the GLORY ring against promotional newcomer Cihad Akipa. The card will also mark the return of perennial heavyweight contender Jahfarr Wilnis, who will be making his first appearance on the GLORY stage since 2019. He will meet...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 83 Essen
programme.desc: Headlining the event is a Light Heavyweight Title Fight between current Champion Sergej Maslobojev and top ranked contender Donegi Abena. A Middleweight Title Bout between Champion Donovan Wisse and current number one contender Cesar Almeida will serve as the event’s co-headliner. Also featured on the card is a middleweight bout between top-five contenders Serkan Ozcaglayan and Sergej Braun. Plus, perennial lightweight contender Guerric Billet will meet Cihad Akipa. GLORY 83 will also mark the promotional debuts for both Uku Jurjendal and Nabil Khachab, who will square off against each other in a heavyweight bout. Additionally, rising featherweight contender Ahmad Chikh Mousa will look to...

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E65 K1 WGP Kesshosen FINAL 2005
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion for 2005.

programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 5 London
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 84 Rotterdam
programme.desc: Lightweight Champion Tyjani Beztati will defend his Title against reigning Featherweight Champion Petch in the main event, also featured on the card is a welterweight bout between Jay Overmeer and Jamie Bates, plus a light heavyweight matchup between Nordine Mahieddine and Felipe Micheletti.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY 85 Rotterdam
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 K1 WGP Opening Round Osaka 2006
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2006 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 5 London
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 84 Rotterdam
programme.desc: Lightweight Champion Tyjani Beztati will defend his Title against reigning Featherweight Champion Petch in the main event, also featured on the card is a welterweight bout between Jay Overmeer and Jamie Bates, plus a light heavyweight matchup between Nordine Mahieddine and Felipe Micheletti.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 6 Istanbul
programme.desc: GLORY makes it's debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E05 GLORY 86 Germany
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 COLLISION 5
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: Veere Di Wedding
programme.desc: Childhood friends Kalindi, Avni, Sakshi, and Meera reunite for Kalindi's wedding. Kalindi, hesitant due to her parents' troubled marriage, calls off the wedding amidst the chaos of Rishabh’s loud family. Avni, a lawyer, faces pressure from her single mother to marry. Sakshi seeks divorce from her husband Vineet, and Meera's marriage to John, a foreigner, is unaccepted by her uncle. Together, the friends help each other resolve their issues.

programme.title: Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas
programme.desc: Orphaned at a young age, Karan Sehgal owns 'Camp Ujhi,' an elite trekking club in Manali. Saher Sethi, a top vlogger, takes up an assignment to review the camp to avoid a family reunion. Suspecting a scam due to high prices, she aims to expose it, but Karan promises a life-changing experience. After a week of thrilling adventures, they fall for each other. Just as everything seems perfect, Saher's ex-boyfriend appears, intent on separating them.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S03 : E110 Mehek S3 E110
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Qarib Qarib Singlle

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E63 Jodha Akbar S4 E63
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param is besotted with Jasmeet when he watches her dance during a Dussehra celebration. An ambitious Jasmeet wishes to be a jewellery designer, but her father and brother discourage her. They even agree to wed her off to Param, who doesn't want her to work after marriage. Once they get married, Jasmeet tries to coax Param to get UK citizenship even if it means resorting to illegal means. But Param is a man of principles and rejects her ideas. Unknown to him, Jasmeet comes up with a risky plan to fulfill her ambitions.
